info.name: Crowdfunding API Hackathon (microsites)
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

                "description": "Supporting research and lifelong education and training is a foundation stone for the progress and development for our society. act4Greece supports research programs and education and lifelong training projects that open up new horizons of knowledge, make the world of information and technology more easily accessible, generate the interest of those receiving the education, ensure the sound quality of the knowledge imparted, enable the acquisition of skills, and generate opportunities for work and further professional, economic, social and personal development.",
